code: #include <RcppArmadillo.h> #include <vcfstream.h> using namespace GenomicDataStreamLib;  // parameters  string file = "test.vcf.gz"; string field = "DS";    // read dosage field string region = "";     // no region filter string samples = "-";   // no samples filter int chunkSize = 4;      // each chunk will read 4 variants  // initialize parameters Param param(file, field, region, samples, chunkSize);  // initialize vcfstream vcfstream vcfObj( param );  // declare DataChunk storing an Armadillo matrix for each chunk DataChunk<arma::mat, VariantInfo> chunk;  // variables for data from a chunk arma::mat X_chunk; VariantInfo info_chunk;  // loop through chunks while( vcfObj.getNextChunk( chunk ) ){      // get data from chunk     X_chunk = chunk.getData();      // get variant information     info_chunk = chunk.getInfo();      // Do analysis with variants in this chunk }
